bio: I am a Blockchain user, NFT Holder, token, coin..
contributionDescription: I want to receive a worthy reward for the effort and dedication I have put into supporting the project and I would be very grateful if I receive those rewards, which shows the fairness and recognition of the project. project with my contributions. Reward is a reward and also a measure and motivation for a blockchain community to develop, which makes us come closer together and work together better.

impactDescription: Optimism Collective - I purchased NFTs and stored them in my blockchain wallet. I have participated in #Op's 18 Quest campaign, I have made fee transactions to brige an NFT from Ether mainet via OP mainet, I have been supporting NFT music on platforms like Soundxyz, opensea.. . mint and save us... we have joined responsible dog communities like Camel Venture to promote NFT music projects on #OP
